Class McPlayer

    MctsPlayer

    public abstract class McPlayer
extends ThreadedPlayer
    A Monte-Carlo player.

      • benchmark

        public double[] benchmark(boolean verbose)
        Runs a 10 second test and returns the speed of the player in thousands of playouts per second (kpps). If verbose is true, prints additional information.

      • getPlayoutLimit

        public int getPlayoutLimit()
        Returns the max number of playouts each thread will run. A playoutLimit <= 0 indicates no limit.
